name: Big upgrade of React codebase
content: We're going to deploy some big internal code refactorings to the React app that powers the DatoCMS administrative areas. We'll follow the deploy closely, but if you happen to find any kind of annoyance/bug, please contact us via support@datocms.com or chat.

updates.content: We made it! We received a bunch of reports of weird things happening in some edge-cases, but overall it was a pretty smooth migration. Thanks for your help!
